endpoint_list.name: get_node_id
endpoint_list.description: identifies the node_id responding to the request at the provided IP address and api port

endpoint_list.name: list_node
endpoint_list.description: returns a list of peer nodes known by the host.  it returns the newest records by default

endpoint_list.name: list_node_memory_extended
endpoint_list.description: returns a list of all peer nodes (node table and memory list) known by the host.  it returns the newest records by default

endpoint_list.name: new_node
endpoint_list.description: inserts a new record to table node

endpoint_list.name: list_keychain_address
endpoint_list.description: returns records from table keychain_address. it returns the newest records by default

endpoint_list.name: get_keychain_address
endpoint_list.description: returns the record for the identified address from table keychain and keychain_address

endpoint_list.name: new_keychain_address
endpoint_list.description: generates a new address and returns the new address record from table address

endpoint_list.name: get_address_balance
endpoint_list.description: returns the available (stable) balance and pending (unstable) balance of an address

endpoint_list.name: list_address
endpoint_list.description: returns records from table address. it returns the newest records by default

endpoint_list.name: send_transaction
endpoint_list.description: submits a new transaction with a transaction payload, containing inputs, signatures, outputs and amounts to the node. this API is generally used in conjunction with the output from API RVBqKlGdk9aEhi5J (sign_transaction)

endpoint_list.name: list_transaction
endpoint_list.description: returns a list of transaction records from table transaction. it returns the newest records by default

endpoint_list.name: sign_transaction
endpoint_list.description: accepts an unsigned transaction payload and private keys to produce a signed version of the transaction_payload_unsigned that is used by API VnJIBrrM0KY3uQ9X to send a transaction

endpoint_list.name: get_node_transaction_stat_summary
endpoint_list.description: returns a summary of transaction statistics from the host

endpoint_list.name: get_node_address_stat_summary
endpoint_list.description: returns a summary of address statistics from the host

endpoint_list.name: list_address_version
endpoint_list.description: return records from table address_version

endpoint_list.name: new_address_version_released
endpoint_list.description: inserts a new record to table address_version.  is_main_network indicates whether the new address version is on the main network or on a test network.  if the new record indicates is_default = true the previous address_version record set to is_default = true is updated to is_default = false.  there can only be a single record for each network that is set to is_default = true

endpoint_list.name: list_config_private
endpoint_list.description: returns private config values that are only available to the node operator

endpoint_list.name: list_config_public
endpoint_list.description: returns returns public config values

endpoint_list.name: optimize_database
endpoint_list.description: executes the sqlite optimize database function on the indicated shard_id, or on all shards if shard_id is not provided. this API pauses the node service, tasks and network until it is finished

endpoint_list.name: reset_transaction_verification_timeout
endpoint_list.description: resets is_timeout field in table transaction records belonging to the provided key_identifier from true to false to allow the node to retry transaction validation

endpoint_list.name: register_node_identity
endpoint_list.description: this API pushes a value from the client node to the host node for it to apply to its database. it upserts a record in the host node's table node_attribute with attribute_type_id = node_public_key.  if a corresponding node_id does not exist in table node, that is inserted as well

endpoint_list.name: list_log
endpoint_list.description: returns a list of log items from the node. it returns the newest records by default

endpoint_list.name: toggle_service_network
endpoint_list.description: toggles the network service for all networks (main or test networks) between running (true) and not running (false)

endpoint_list.name: toggle_service_node
endpoint_list.description: toggles the node service between running (true) and not running (false)

endpoint_list.name: get_mnemonic_phrase
endpoint_list.description: returns the 24 word mnemonic phrase for the active session which is stored by default in the millix directory

endpoint_list.name: get_address_private_key
endpoint_list.description: returns the private key for the indicated address that is derived from the master key that is temporarily stored in node memory for the active wallet

endpoint_list.name: update_config_value
endpoint_list.description: updates table config value field for the indicated config_id record

endpoint_list.name: list_node_attribute
endpoint_list.description: returns records from table node_attributes.  it returns the newest records by default

endpoint_list.name: get_transaction_input
endpoint_list.description: returns a single record from table transaction_input as indicated by transaction_id and input_position in the indicated shard

endpoint_list.name: get_transaction
endpoint_list.description: returns a single record from table transaction as indicated by transaction_id in the indicated shard

endpoint_list.name: get_transaction_extended
endpoint_list.description: returns a single record with all information about a transaction as indicated by transaction_id in the indicated shard

endpoint_list.name: get_transaction_output
endpoint_list.description: returns a single record from table transaction_output as indicated by transaction_id and output_position in the indicated shard

endpoint_list.name: list_transaction_output
endpoint_list.description: returns records from table transaction_output that match the provided parameters.  it returns the newest records by default

endpoint_list.name: list_transaction_input
endpoint_list.description: returns records from table transaction_input that match the provided parameters.  it returns the newest records by default

endpoint_list.name: new_session_with_phrase
endpoint_list.description: uses the passphrase and 24 word mnemonic phrase to set the active wallet used in the session by the node

endpoint_list.name: new_session_with_file
endpoint_list.description: uses the passphrase and file path containing the 24 word mnemonic phrase to set the active wallet used in the session by the node

endpoint_list.name: list_shard
endpoint_list.description: returns records from table shard. it returns the newest records by default

endpoint_list.name: add_shard
endpoint_list.description: adds a new shard and returns the record

endpoint_list.name: support_shard
endpoint_list.description: adds support to an existent shard

endpoint_list.name: verify_address
endpoint_list.description: verifies if an address is valid

endpoint_list.name: get_random_mnemonic
endpoint_list.description: returns a random mnemonic phrase

endpoint_list.name: new_session
endpoint_list.description: uses the passphrase to activate the wallet used in the previous session

endpoint_list.name: get_session
endpoint_list.description: get the active wallet in the node

endpoint_list.name: get_stat_summary
endpoint_list.description: get the node stat summary

endpoint_list.name: get_os_info
endpoint_list.description: get the node os info

endpoint_list.name: send_transaction_from_wallet
endpoint_list.description: submits a new transaction from the active wallet, specifying the outputs and amounts to the node. this API builds the tx payload and submits it

endpoint_list.name: list_transaction_history
endpoint_list.description: list transaction history for a given wallet

endpoint_list.name: end_session
endpoint_list.description: ends the active wallet session in the node

endpoint_list.name: wallet_stop_ongoing_transaction
endpoint_list.description: stops ongoing transaction if any

endpoint_list.name: reset_transaction_validation
endpoint_list.description: resets transaction validation

endpoint_list.name: get_config_by_name
endpoint_list.description: get node config by name

endpoint_list.name: get_known_wallet_balance
endpoint_list.description: returns the available (stable) balance and pending (unstable) balance of all known wallet

endpoint_list.name: get_node_public_ip
endpoint_list.description: get node public ip

endpoint_list.name: remove_address_version
endpoint_list.description: remove wallet address version

endpoint_list.name: get_known_address_balance
endpoint_list.description: returns the available (stable) balance and pending (unstable) balance of all known addresses
